about_the_game:
This DLC pack adds the following content to COGEN: Sword of Rewind.

●Bonus Playable Character: Yuji Otori
●Additional Story for Yuji Otori
●New Stage: EXTRA 2-1
●New Stage: EXTRA 2-2 (Unlocked after beating EXTRA 2-1)
●New Stage: EXTRA 2-3 (Unlocked after beating EXTRA 2-2)

This DLC contains story content that takes place after the events of the main game. We strongly recommend you beat the main game before playing this!

This DLC content requires COGEN: Sword of Rewind (sold separately) to play. The latest patch may also be required, so make sure to update your game before you begin.
detailed_description:
This DLC pack adds the following content to COGEN: Sword of Rewind.

●Bonus Playable Character: Yuji Otori

●New Stage: EXTRA 2-3 (Unlocked after beating EXTRA 2-2)

This DLC contains story content that takes place after the events of the main game. We strongly recommend you beat the main game before playing this!

This DLC content requires COGEN: Sword of Rewind (sold separately) to play. The latest patch may also be required, so make sure to update your game before you begin.
